comment: Prof An is fantastic. She always responds to emails quickly and is always willing to help after class if she has time. The class isn't easy, but that is expected when learning a new language. Plenty of quizzes throughout, she is always willing to let you make up testshw. 1010 teacher. Study and you'll do fine. I'll take any KOR class she teaches.

Really great teacher. Sends lots of emails for assignments, study guides, and in-class review. Gives students a voice in directing the class - as in, what to put emphasis on. Lots of homework, WB pages, vocab quizzes. You have to make a korean children's book. Also, you submit voice recordings of reading passages often. Overall, good class
